summary: This document is a Uniform Residential Loan Application completed by Brian Vickers, indicating his financial status and details regarding a mortgage loan application for a property located in Charlotte, NC. It includes information about income, assets, liabilities, and the purpose of the loan.

persons.name: Brian Vickers
persons.context: Brian Vickers is the primary borrower applying for a mortgage loan, providing detailed financial information including income and assets.

persons.name: Joann Brown
persons.context: Joann Brown is the loan originator associated with the application, responsible for processing the loan application.

locations: 435 S Tryon St Unit 700, Charlotte, NC 28202
329 Sea Breeze Ave, Palm Beach, FL 33480
keyFacts: The loan application is for a mortgage amount of $325,000 with a fixed interest rate of 3.00% for 180 months.
Brian Vickers has reported a gross monthly income of $6,361.13.
The application includes details of existing liens amounting to $318,915.90 on the property.
The document indicates that the property will be held jointly.
Joann Brown is identified as the loan originator from Fifth Third Mortgage Company.
